title: Omega Squad Teemo Bug
body: Just would like to point out that sometimes Omega Squad Teemo will occasionally say a regular Teemo quote. I have no video example sorry.

replies.body:
Hey DartExplosion10! 

Thanks for the report! We'll see what's going on here and see if we can repro the issue. ^-^
id also like to point out that this has only happened to me when there was another teemo on the other team.
D'Oh! Okay, this is likely due to audio theft. Thanks for the lead. :)
do you plan on fixing it any time soon? its getting kind of annoying :/
Did you guys ever fix the bug where he could recall invis if he had baron buff?
Mmmm. I wasn't personally aware of this, but I can check.
guess i will wait abit before i buy that skin
